results.title: Efficacy of Adding Oral Simvastatin to Topical Therapy for Treatment of Psoriasis: The Vietnamese Experience
results.journal: Open Access Maced J Med Sci
results.text_hl: Interestingly, we also found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ improved the PASI score in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@psoriatic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Trong HN, Tat TN, Anh TTN, Uyen NP, Van TN, Hau KT, Gandolfi M, Satolli F, Feliciani C, Tirant M, Vojvodic A, Lotti T. Efficacy of Adding Oral Simvastatin to Topical Therapy for Treatment of Psoriasis: The Vietnamese Experience Open Access Maced J Med Sci. 2019 Jan 30;7(2):237-242. PMID: 30745969

results.title: Effects of simvastatin, atorvastatin, ezetimibe, and ezetimibe + simvastatin combination on the inflammatory process and on the liver metabolic changes of arthritic rats.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combination on the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ process and on the liver metabolic changes of @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@arthritic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Bracht L, Barbosa CP, Caparroz-Assef SM, Cuman RK, Ishii-Iwamoto EL, Bracht A, Bersani-Amado CA. Effects of simvastatin, atorvastatin, ezetimibe, and ezetimibe + simvastatin combination on the inflammatory process and on the liver metabolic changes of arthritic rats. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2012 Dec;26(6):722-34. PMID: 21801201

results.title: Bone protective effect of simvastatin in experimental arthritis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ suppressed the periarticular @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone destruction@@@ occurring late in the course of disease, preserving periarticular BMD and preventing increases in periarticular osteoclasts and serum @CHEMICAL_pyridinoline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C015484 @@@pyridinoline@@@ levels in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@arthritic@@@ animals, while having no effect on these measures in normal animals.

citations.NLM: Funk JL, Chen J, Downey KJ, Clark RA. Bone protective effect of simvastatin in experimental arthritis. J Rheumatol. 2008 Jun;35(6):1083-91. PMID: 18464303
citations.BibTeX: @article{18464303, title={Bone protective effect of simvastatin in experimental arthritis.}, author={Funk JL and Chen J and Downey KJ and Clark RA}, journal={J Rheumatol}, volume={35}, number={6}, pages={1083-91}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces leucocyte- and platelet-endothelial cell interaction in murine antigen-induced arthritis in vivo.
results.text_hl: In addition, a significant reduction in FCD was seen in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@arthritic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, along with a reduction in @DISEASE_Knee_Fractures @DISEASE_MESH:D000092443 @@@knee joint swelling@@@ of the AiA @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Gottschalk O, Dao Trong ML, Metz P, Wallmichrath J, Piltz S, Jauch KW, Jansson V, Schmitt-Sody M. Simvastatin reduces leucocyte- and platelet-endothelial cell interaction in murine antigen-induced arthritis in vivo. Scand J Rheumatol. 2014;43(5):356-63. PMID: 24825390
citations.BibTeX: @article{24825390, title={Simvastatin reduces leucocyte- and platelet-endothelial cell interaction in murine antigen-induced arthritis in vivo.}, author={Gottschalk O and Dao Trong ML and Metz P and Wallmichrath J and Piltz S and Jauch KW and Jansson V and Schmitt-Sody M}, journal={Scand J Rheumatol}, volume={43}, number={5}, pages={356-63}}

results.title: Circadian rhythms and medical diseases: does it matter when drugs are taken?
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Adequate evidence seems to support that at least ACE-inhibitors or angiotensin receptor blockers, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, corticosteroids (slow-release formulation) for @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@arthritic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Ranitidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011899 @@@ranitidine@@@ should preferably be administered in the evening.

citations.NLM: De Giorgi A, Mallozzi Menegatti A, Fabbian F, Portaluppi F, Manfredini R. Circadian rhythms and medical diseases: does it matter when drugs are taken? Eur J Intern Med. 2013 Dec;24(8):698-706. PMID: 23611529
citations.BibTeX: @article{23611529, title={Circadian rhythms and medical diseases: does it matter when drugs are taken?}, author={De Giorgi A and Mallozzi Menegatti A and Fabbian F and Portaluppi F and Manfredini R}, journal={Eur J Intern Med}, volume={24}, number={8}, pages={698-706}}
